mentionedBy.name: Twilio Inc.
mentionedBy.notes: Acquired by Ericsson in 2022 for its carrier-grade voice backbone. Often compared to Twilio as 'the Ali vs. Frazier of CPaaS.' Provides robust voice and messaging APIs with enterprise-level reliability.
